properties.description: Coffee Bar is open between 10.00 am and 12.00 noon on Mondays and Wednesdays, and between 10.00 am and 1:30 pm on Fridays. We offer a welcoming, accessible & supportive space to all; a warm, inclusive, non-judgmental space where people can find community, make friends, receive pastoral care, be connected with other services or simply enjoy a hot drink and some food (all free of charge). We provide hot and cold refreshments, good conversation and a very popular crafts & activities table. Steve, our Pastoral Support Worker & Coffee Bar Coordinator, is supported by an experienced team of friendly volunteers. Our team is on hand to help in any way we can.
